description:
Reika Nogami reveals to Ryo that someone high up in the chain of police command has yakuza connections and is responsible for her former partner`s murder.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saeko no Imouto wa Onna Tantei (Kouhen): Passion Lady no Dai Torimonochou
Saeko`s little sister is a private eye! A passionate lady`s big secret (Part Two)
冴子の妹は女探偵 (後編) 翔んだ女(パッションレディー)の大捕物帳
